name: Sunken Realms
description:
The Lost City was once a thriving underground metropolis until it was cursed by the gods and abandoned. Now only a fool would dare pass it's gates (that's you). Descend into an abandoned underground city to battle orcs, solve puzzles, collect loot, and return to the surface to craft weapons, armor, and potions.
Features:
• Hand-crafted rooms are procedurally re-arranged every time you enter the dungeon so you'll never play the same layout twice


• Fluid, 3rd-Person Melee and Ranged combat


• Collect loot from your vanquished enemies and treasure chests


• Find Spell Scrolls to learn powerful spells


• Return to camp between runs to craft new gear and items, cook food, visit the Merchant to trade, and upgrade your character at the Soul Forge


• Immersive, original score
